document_data.name: Order of the Silver Chalice
document_data.orgname: the Order of the Silver Chalice
document_data.mainbody: The '''Order of the Silver Chalice''' was a knightly order dedicated to [[Siamorphe]] the Noble.
document_data.Activities: This group was primarily made up of Tethyrian nobles dedicated to locating lost members of noble families and restoring to power those who would govern with the interests of the common people at heart. and the crown recognized them as a knightly order.
document_data.Members:
* Marquise Scion [[Aalangama Gulderhorn]] 
* Queen [[Zaranda Star]], Defensor Royal of the Chalice, honorary member
* King [[Haedrak Rhindaun III]], Defensor Royal of the Chalice, honorary member
* Lady Warlord [[Vajra Valmeyjar]], Duchess of [[Ankaram]], honorary member
* Lord [[Oxsal Keeneyes]], Count of [[Monteshi]], honorary member
* Lord [[Tardeth Llanistaph]], Duke of [[Suretmarch]], honorary member
* Lord [[Oon Santele]], Count of [[Surkazar]], honorary member
